name: TTTT
description:
One key idea, the triangle goes up and the trap closes at the same time.

TTTT! TRY THE TRAPPED TRIANGLE.

Get the highest score in this hard and procedural endless runner for IOS and Android. It's FREE!

FEATURES:

  • Easy to play, difficult to master
  • Get the highest score
  • 8 different traps
  • Random and procedural generation
  • 2 themes with 6 colors
  • 8-bit sound effects
  • Pixel art with minimal graphics
  • Leaderboard
